name: Falafel
description: Chickpea, herbs, spices.

name: Beans
description: Beans plate with Tehyna and limon

name: Beans & Eggs
description: Beans plate with Eggs, Tehyna and limon

name: Baba Ghanoug
description: cream of roasted eggplant, olive oil, garlic, sesame paste (tahini) and lemon

name: Pasta Salad
description: Lettuce, vegetables, mozzarella.

name: Greek Salad
description: Cucumbers, onion, feta cheese.

name: Koshary
description: Rice, macroni, shearya, onion, and salsa

name: Shawarma
description: A large cone of pressed lamb or chicken that is rotated vertically in front of a flame grill

name: Alex-Kebda
description: The liver is prepared with hot pepper and garlic or onion can be added.As for the sausage

name: Fried Calamari
description: Squid, buttermilk.

name: Molokhya
description: A soup made from mallow leaves. Green in color, it has a thick, viscous texture.

name: Besarah
description: A creamy green puree prepared with parsley, dill, leek, ground beans, spices, green pepper and fried onions on top.

name: Pigeon
description: A traditional delicacy food, pigeons (Hamaam) are bred throughout Egypt in conical pigeon towers.

name: Mahshi
description: A baked vegetables, usually peppers, zucchini or aubergine, stuffed with rice mixed with aromatic herbs (parsley, corianderâ€¦).

name: Kofta
description: Flame-grilled chunks of lamb (kebab) and spiced minced meat made into a sausage and grilled on a skewer (kofta)

name: Hawawshii
description: A bread (something similar to pita bread) that is usually filled with minced meat, onion, pepper. Hawawshi is perhaps best known as a staple of home-style Egyptian cooking to make you feel good

name: Mix-Desserts
description: Mix od Basbosaa and Konafa in one plate

name: Basbosaa
description: A tasty dessert that has crossed borders, the Basbousa is of Ottoman origin. Found in different countries, it is favored by people all over the world.

name: Konafaa
description: The Kanefeh is a cake prepared with some semolina noodles, similar to angel hair, which are rolled and flattened and cooked together with butter and a creamy cheese over low heat. Once ready, it is soaked in syrup and a few groundnuts are added.

name: Om-Ali
description: Om-Ali is made of layers of puff pastry soaked in milk and mixed with nuts, raisins, coconut flakes, and sugar, and then baked.

name: Baklava
description: A cream base and a crunchy vermicelli pastry crust and Basbousa, made of semolina pastry soaked in honey and topped with hazelnuts.
